trans-unit.source: An abstract class that, when implemented, represents a binding element that supports channel SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类，在实现时表示支持通道 SOAP 消息安全的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: This class is the base class for the SOAP message security binding elements in WCF.
trans-unit.target: 此类是在 WCF 中的 SOAP 消息安全绑定元素的基类。

trans-unit.source: There are three implementations of this abstract class: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 此抽象类有三种实现：<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: These implementations model the bindings defined in the WS-Security Policy specification.
trans-unit.target: 这些实现为在 WS-Security Policy 规范中定义的绑定建模。

trans-unit.source: A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element that represents the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack is added second, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 自定义绑定包含以特定顺序排列的绑定元素集合：首先添加表示绑定堆栈顶部的元素，其次是绑定堆栈的第二个元素，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: To add this class to a binding, do the following:
trans-unit.target: 若要将此类添加到绑定中，请执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Create a custom binding element that is above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定堆栈中创建位于此绑定元素之上的自定义绑定元素，比如可选的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: Add these elements in the order previously described to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> 方法，按先前描述的顺序将这些元素添加到 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of a security binding element derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个派生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 的安全绑定元素的实例，如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: Add the derived security binding element to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将派生的安全绑定元素添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 将任何其他自定义绑定元素添加到集合，比如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>, see [SecurityBindingElement Authentication Modes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/securitybindingelement-authentication-modes.md) and [How to: Create a Custom Binding Using the SecurityBindingElement](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-custom-binding-using-the-securitybindingelement.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>，请参阅[SecurityBindingElement 身份验证模式](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/securitybindingelement-authentication-modes.md)和[如何： 自定义绑定使用 SecurityBindingElement 创建](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-custom-binding-using-the-securitybindingelement.md)。

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> object is created, you should treat its properties as immutable.
trans-unit.target: 在创建了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 对象后，应将其属性视为不可变。

trans-unit.source: Calling `set` on some properties may have unpredictable effects: the binding may behave as if the property retained its old value, with a runtime failure being the only indication of an issue.
trans-unit.target: 对某些属性调用 `set` 可能会产生不可预知的效果：绑定的行为可能就好像属性保留了其旧值一样，并出现运行时错误，该错误是问题的唯一迹象。

trans-unit.source: Two properties known to behave this way are <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 已知具有此行为的两个属性为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There may be other properties of which this is also true.
trans-unit.target: 其他某些属性可能也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether mixed-mode secured messages can be sent over an unsecured transport such as HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否能通过不安全传输（如 HTTP）发送混合模式安全消息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if mixed-mode secured messages can be sent over an unsecured transport; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果能通过不安全传输发送混合模式安全消息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured for anonymous client authentication and certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，配置该元素以进行匿名客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> that holds the new binding.
trans-unit.target: 容纳新绑定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The client and server must be configured out of band with the service certificate.
trans-unit.target: 客户端和服务器必须使用服务证书在带外进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The binding is created with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.WSSecurity11WSTrustFebruary2005WSSecureConversationFebruary2005WSSecurityPolicy11%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 创建绑定时，其 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> 设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.WSSecurity11WSTrustFebruary2005WSSecureConversationFebruary2005WSSecurityPolicy11%2A>，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that expects clients to do certificate-based authentication using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全绑定元素，该元素期望客户端使用 SOAP 消息安全执行基于证书的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This binding element expects the transport to provide server authentication as well as message protection (for example, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素期望传输提供服务器身份验证和消息保护（例如 HTTPS）。

trans-unit.source: The client must be configured with a certificate it uses for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 此客户端必须使用其用于身份验证的证书进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> object is created by calling this method, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> property should be treated as immutable.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此方法创建了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 对象后，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> 属性应被视为不可变。

trans-unit.source: Inconsistent binding behavior may occur if this value is modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果修改此值，则可能出现不一致的绑定行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that expects clients to do certificate-based authentication using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全绑定元素，该元素期望客户端使用 SOAP 消息安全执行基于证书的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding element expects the transport to provide server authentication as well as message protection (for example, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素期望传输提供服务器身份验证和消息保护（例如 HTTPS）。

trans-unit.source: The binding element is configured to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.Default%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> class.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素配置为使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.Default%2A> 类的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The created binding has <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所创建绑定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 该绑定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that expects clients to do certificate-based authentication using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全绑定元素，该元素期望客户端使用 SOAP 消息安全执行基于证书的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This binding element expects the transport to provide server authentication as well as message protection (for example, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素期望传输提供服务器身份验证和消息保护（例如 HTTPS）。

trans-unit.source: The binding element is configured with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素是使用指定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> 配置的。

trans-unit.source: The created binding has <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所创建绑定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="version" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="version" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a binding element using a certificate to sign messages.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用证书签名消息的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: This binding element can be used only for one-way message exchanges and is capable only of signing the message.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定元素仅可用于单向消息交换，且仅能签名消息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: This binding element requires the client to configure a certificate for authentication purposes.

trans-unit.target: 客户端使用 SOAP 级别的 SSL 协议对服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The created binding has <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> set to `true` and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.WSSecurity11WSTrustFebruary2005WSSecureConversationFebruary2005WSSecurityPolicy11%2A>.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="issuedTokenParameters" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cancellation is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to <see langword="false" /> enables a security context token that is useful in Web farm scenarios, because in this mode the session state is encoded inside the established security context token instead of being kept in the server memory.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其设置为 <see langword="false" />，将能够启用在网络场方案中十分有用的安全上下文令牌，因为在此模式下，会话状态是在建立的安全上下文令牌内部编码的，而不是保留在服务器内存中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to require client authentication based on the client's Kerberos token.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要进行基于客户端的 Kerberos 令牌进行客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: To do Kerberos authentication, the server must run in an account that has a service principal name registered with Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行 Kerberos 身份验证，服务器必须在注册到 Active Directory 的服务主体名称的帐户中运行。

trans-unit.source: NetworkService is such an account.
trans-unit.target: NetworkService 属于这种帐户。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that is configured to require SOAP-security based client authentication using the client's Kerberos token.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要使用客户端 Kerberos 令牌进行基于 SOAP 安全的客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.target: NetworkService 属于这种帐户。

trans-unit.source: Creates an asymmetric security binding element that is configured to require certificate-based client authentication as well as certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个非对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于证书的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The client must be configured with its certificate as well as the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: 客户端必须使用其证书以及服务器证书进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The server must be configured with its certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此服务器必须使用其证书进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Creates an asymmetric security binding element that is configured to require certificate-based client authentication as well as certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个非对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于证书的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The binding is configured so that a new random symmetric key (encrypted for the server) is generated for every request by the client and is used to protect the request as well as the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 配置绑定，以实现为每个客户端请求生成新的随机对称密钥（为服务器加密），该密钥用于对请求和服务器的回应进行保护。

trans-unit.source: The client's certificate is used as an endorsing supporting token on the request.
trans-unit.target: 客户端证书在请求时可用作认可支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> is actually created.
trans-unit.target: 已实际创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The message security version.
trans-unit.target: 消息安全版本。

trans-unit.source: Creates an asymmetric security binding element that is configured to require certificate-based client authentication as well as certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个非对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于证书的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If the version is WSSecurity10, then the binding element is configured so that the client request is signed by its certificate and encrypted with the server certificate.
trans-unit.target: 如果版本为 WSSecurity10，则将配置绑定元素以实现客户端请求由其证书签名并使用服务器证书加密。

trans-unit.source: If the version is WSSecurity11, then the binding element is configured so that a new random symmetric key (encrypted for the server) is generated for every request by the client and is used to protect the request as well as the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果版本为 WSSecurity11，则配置绑定元素，以实现为每个客户端请求生成新的随机对称密钥（为服务器加密），该密钥用于对请求和服务器的回应进行保护。

trans-unit.source: The client's certificate is used as an endorsing supporting token on the request.
trans-unit.target: 客户端证书在请求时可用作认可支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> object is created by calling this method, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> property is immutable.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此方法创建了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 对象后，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> 属性为不可变。

trans-unit.source: Calling `set` on it does not change it.
trans-unit.target: 对它调用 `set` 不会将其改变。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="version" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="version" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The message security version.
trans-unit.target: 消息安全版本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow a serialized signing token on the reply; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 在答复时允许序列化签名标记，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an asymmetric security binding element that is configured to require certificate-based client authentication as well as certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个非对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于证书的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The `allowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply` parameter, when `true`, enables interoperability with older versions of Web Services Enhancements (WSE).
trans-unit.target: `allowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply` 参数为 `true` 时，将启用较旧版本 Web Services Enhancements (WSE) 的互操作性。

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> object is created by calling this method, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> property should be treated as immutable.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此方法创建了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 对象后，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> 属性应被视为不可变。

trans-unit.source: Inconsistent binding behavior may occur if this value is modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果修改此值，则可能出现不一致的绑定行为。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="version" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="version" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an asymmetric security binding element that is configured to require certificate-based client authentication as well as certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个非对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于证书的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This authentication mode can be used to secure duplex message-exchange patterns and requires the service to be configured with the client certificate out of band.
trans-unit.target: 此身份验证模式可用于保护双工消息交换模式，它需要用带外客户端证书配置服务。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个非对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于证书的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This authentication mode can be used to secure duplex message exchange patterns and requires the service to be configured with the client certificate out of band.
trans-unit.target: 此身份验证模式可用于保护双工消息交换模式，它需要用带外客户端证书配置服务。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> object is created by calling this method, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> property should be treated as immutable.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此方法创建了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 对象后，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> 属性应被视为不可变。

trans-unit.source: Inconsistent binding behavior may occur if this value is modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果修改此值，则可能出现不一致的绑定行为。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="version" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="version" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to establish a secure conversation between the client and service.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为可在客户端和服务之间建立安全的对话。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued at the end of the secure conversation handshake is used to secure the messages.
trans-unit.target: 在安全对话握手结束时颁发的安全上下文令牌用于保护消息的安全。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> that contains specification on how the secure conversation handshake messages are secured.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 包含如何保护安全对话握手消息的规范。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to establish a secure conversation between the client and service.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为可在客户端和服务之间建立安全的对话。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued at the end of the secure conversation handshake is used to secure the messages.
trans-unit.target: 在安全对话握手结束时颁发的安全上下文令牌用于保护消息的安全。

trans-unit.source: The bootstrap security binding element specifies how the secure conversation handshake messages are secured.
trans-unit.target: 启动安全绑定元素指定如何保护安全对话握手消息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The binding element is configured to use session-based security context tokens.
trans-unit.target: 配置绑定元素以使用基于会话的安全上下文令牌。

trans-unit.source: The `bootstrapSecurity` is used to indicate the security binding and policy used to request a secure conversation token from the service.
trans-unit.target: `bootstrapSecurity` 用于指示安全绑定和策略，该绑定和策略用于向服务请求安全对话令牌。

trans-unit.source: If `bootstrapSecurity` is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>, the binding element returned by this method is also one, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> is set to `true`; and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`; and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `bootstrapSecurity` 是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>，则由此方法返回的绑定元素也是它，且 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> 设置为 `true`；而且从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`；而且从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> is returned, with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则将返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>，并且 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> 设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bootstrapSecurity" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bootstrapSecurity" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> that contains specification on how the secure conversation handshake messages are secured.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 包含如何保护安全对话握手消息的规范。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cancellation is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this parameter to <see langword="false" /> enables a security context token that is useful in Web farm scenarios, because in this mode the session state is encoded inside the established security context token instead of being kept in the server memory.
trans-unit.target: 将此参数设置为 <see langword="false" /> 可在网络场方案中启用有用的安全上下文令牌，因为在此模式下，会话状态是在建立的安全上下文令牌内部编码的，而不是保留在服务器内存中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to establish a secure conversation between the client and service.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为可在客户端和服务之间建立安全的对话。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued at the end of the secure conversation handshake is used to secure the messages.
trans-unit.target: 在安全对话握手结束时颁发的安全上下文令牌用于保护消息的安全。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If `requireCancellation` is `false`, cookie-based security context tokens are issued; otherwise, session-based security context tokens are issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `false`，则颁发基于 Cookie 的安全上下文令牌；否则，颁发基于会话的安全上下文令牌。

trans-unit.source: The `bootstrapSecurity` is used to indicate the security binding and policy used to request a `SecureConversationToken` from the service.
trans-unit.target: `bootstrapSecurity` 用于指示安全绑定和策略，该绑定和策略用于向服务请求 `SecureConversationToken`。

trans-unit.source: If `bootstrapSecurity` is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>, the binding element returned by this method is also a `TransportSecurityBindingElement`, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> is set to `true`; and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`; and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `bootstrapSecurity` 是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>，则由此方法返回的绑定元素也是 `TransportSecurityBindingElement`，且 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> 设置为 `true`；而且从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`；而且从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> is returned, with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则将返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>，并且 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> 设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: When impersonation is required on [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)], use a secure session without a security context token.
trans-unit.target: 当需要在 [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)] 上进行模拟时，请不要在安全会话中使用安全上下文令牌。

trans-unit.source: When security context tokens are used with impersonation an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在模拟时使用安全上下文令牌，则会引发 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Unsupported Scenarios](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[不支持的方案](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about secure sessions, see [Secure Sessions](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/secure-sessions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全会话的详细信息，请参阅[安全会话](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/secure-sessions.md)。

trans-unit.source: If `bootstrapSecurity` is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>, the binding element returned by this method is also a `TransportSecurityBindingElement`, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> is set to `true`; and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`; and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> is returned, with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则将返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>，并且 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A> 设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to do SOAP-level SSL negotiation between the client and server.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为可在客户端和服务器之间执行 SOAP 级别的 SSL 协商。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a client certificate is required during the SSL negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 SSL 协商的过程中需要客户端证书，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to do SOAP-level SSL negotiation between the client and server, noting whether a client certificate is required.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为可在客户端和服务器之间运行 SOAP 级别的 SSL 协商，并说明是否需要客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> that holds the new binding.
trans-unit.target: 容纳新绑定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued after the SSL negotiation is cookie based.
trans-unit.target: 在 SSL 协商后颁发的安全上下文令牌是基于 Cookie 的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a client certificate is required during the SSL negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 SSL 协商的过程中需要客户端证书，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cancellation is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要取消，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to <see langword="false" /> enables a security context token that is useful in Web farm scenarios, because in this mode the session state is encoded inside the established security context token instead of being kept in the server memory.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其设置为 <see langword="false" />，将能够启用在网络场方案中十分有用的安全上下文令牌，因为在此模式下，会话状态是在建立的安全上下文令牌内部编码的，而不是保留在服务器内存中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that does SOAP SSL negotiation, noting whether a client certificate and cancellation is required.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素执行 SOAP SSL 协商，并说明是否需要客户端证书和取消。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> that holds the new binding.
trans-unit.target: 容纳新绑定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued after the SSL negotiation is session based is `requireCancellation` is `true`; otherwise, it is cookie based.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `true`，则在 SSL 协商后颁发的安全上下文令牌是基于会话的；否则，是基于 Cookie 的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that does SOAP SSPI negotiation based on the Negotiate authentication package.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素基于协商身份验证包执行 SOAP SSPI 协商。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that does SOAP SSPI negotiation based on the Negotiate authentication package.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素基于协商身份验证包执行 SOAP SSPI 协商。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued at the end of the SSPI negotiation is cookie based.
trans-unit.target: 在 SSPI 协商末尾颁发的安全上下文令牌是基于 Cookie 的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether cancellation is required.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否需要取消。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to <see langword="false" /> enables a security context token that is useful in Web farm scenarios, because in this mode the session state is encoded inside the established security context token instead of being kept in the server memory.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其设置为 <see langword="false" />，将能够启用在网络场方案中十分有用的安全上下文令牌，因为在此模式下，会话状态是在建立的安全上下文令牌内部编码的，而不是保留在服务器内存中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that does SOAP SSPI negotiation based on the Negotiate authentication package.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素基于协商身份验证包执行 SOAP SSPI 协商。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If `requireCancellation` is `false`, the security context token issued at the end of the SSPI negotiation is cookie based; otherwise, it is session based.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `false`，则在 SSPI 协议末尾颁发的安全上下文令牌是基于 Cookie 的；否则，是基于会话的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that is configured for client authentication based on SOAP SSPI negotiation using the Negotiate authentication package.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全绑定元素，该元素配置为使用协商身份验证包基于 SOAP SSPI 协商进行客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The binding element requires the transport to provide server authentication and message protection (for example, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素需要传输提供服务器身份验证和消息保护（例如 HTTPS）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that is configured for client authentication based on SOAP SSPI negotiation using the Negotiate authentication package.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全绑定元素，该元素配置为使用协商身份验证包基于 SOAP SSPI 协商进行客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The binding element requires the transport to provide server authentication and message protection (for example, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素需要传输提供服务器身份验证和消息保护（例如 HTTPS）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued at the end of SSPI negotiation is cookie based.
trans-unit.target: 在 SSPI 协商末尾颁发的安全上下文令牌是基于 Cookie 的。

trans-unit.source: The created binding has <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所创建绑定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether cancellation is required.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否需要取消。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to <see langword="false" /> enables a security context token that is useful in Web farm scenarios, because in this mode the session state is encoded inside the established security context token instead of being kept in the server memory.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其设置为 <see langword="false" />，将能够启用在网络场方案中十分有用的安全上下文令牌，因为在此模式下，会话状态是在建立的安全上下文令牌内部编码的，而不是保留在服务器内存中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that is configured for client authentication based on SOAP SSPI negotiation using the Negotiate authentication package.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全绑定元素，该元素配置为使用协商身份验证包基于 SOAP SSPI 协商进行客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The binding element requires the transport to provide server authentication and message protection (for example, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素需要传输提供服务器身份验证和消息保护（例如 HTTPS）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If `requireCancellation` is `false`, cookie-based security context tokens are issued; otherwise, session-based security context tokens are issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `false`，则颁发基于 Cookie 的安全上下文令牌；否则，颁发基于会话的安全上下文令牌。

trans-unit.source: The created binding has <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所创建绑定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to require user name- and password-based client authentication and certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于用户名和密码的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The created binding element requires the client to be configured with a service certificate that is out-of-band before opening a communication channel with a service.
trans-unit.target: 在使用服务打开信道之前，创建的绑定元素需要使用带外服务证书配置客户端。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The server certificate must be configured out of band at the client.
trans-unit.target: 服务器证书必须对客户端进行带外配置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to require user name- and password-based client authentication and certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于用户名和密码的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The client authenticates the server using the SOAP-level SSL protocol.
trans-unit.target: 客户端使用 SOAP 级别的 SSL 协议对服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to require user name- and password-based client authentication and certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于用户名和密码的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The client authenticates the server using the SOAP-level SSL protocol.
trans-unit.target: 客户端使用 SOAP 级别的 SSL 协议对服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The security context token issued at the end of SSPI negotiation is cookie based.
trans-unit.target: 在 SSPI 协商末尾颁发的安全上下文令牌是基于 Cookie 的。

trans-unit.source: The client does not need to be provisioned with the server certificate because it obtains it as part of the SSL protocol.
trans-unit.target: 不必使用服务器证书配置客户端，因为服务器证书将作为 SSL 协议的组成部分被客户端获取。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether cancellation is required.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否需要取消。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to <see langword="false" /> enables a security context token that is useful in Web farm scenarios, because in this mode the session state is encoded inside the established security context token instead of being kept in the server memory.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其设置为 <see langword="false" />，将能够启用在网络场方案中十分有用的安全上下文令牌，因为在此模式下，会话状态是在建立的安全上下文令牌内部编码的，而不是保留在服务器内存中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric security binding element that is configured to require user name- and password-based client authentication and certificate-based server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为需要基于用户名和密码的客户端身份验证以及基于证书的服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The client authenticates the server using the SOAP-level SSL protocol.
trans-unit.target: 客户端使用 SOAP 级别的 SSL 协议对服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If `requireCancellation` is `false`, stateful security context tokens are issued; otherwise, stateless security context tokens are issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `false`，则颁发有状态的安全上下文令牌；否则，颁发无状态的安全上下文令牌。

trans-unit.source: The client does not need to be provisioned with the server certificate because it obtains it as part of the SSL protocol.
trans-unit.target: 不必使用服务器证书配置客户端，因为服务器证书将作为 SSL 协议的组成部分被客户端获取。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security binding element that is configured for client authentication based on a user name and password sent as part of the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对称安全绑定元素，该元素配置为基于作为 SOAP 消息的组成部分发送的用户名和密码对客户端进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The binding element requires the transport to provide server authentication and message protection (for example, HTTPS).
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素需要传输提供服务器身份验证和消息保护（例如 HTTPS）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The created binding has <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所创建绑定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalClientSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 中返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.LocalServiceSettings%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message encryption and key-wrap algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息加密和密钥换行算法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" /> object that represents the message encryption and key-wrap algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 表示消息加密和密钥包装算法的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite> object that contains numerous properties that specify security algorithms that are to be used for signing, encryption, key derivation, and other cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite>包含大量属性属性指定要用于签名、 加密、 密钥派生和其他加密操作的安全算法的对象。

trans-unit.source: It also controls the key sizes that are used for doing these cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 此对象还控制用于执行上述加密操作的密钥的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The value is null on a <see langword="set" />.
trans-unit.target: 值在 <see langword="set" /> 上为 Null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether WCF can send and receive unsecured responses to secured requests.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 WCF 是否能发送和接收对安全请求的不安全响应。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if WCF can send and receive unsecured responses to secured requests; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 WCF 可以发送和接收对安全请求; 不安全的响应否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the endpoint that supports token parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取支持令牌参数的终结点。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> object that represents the endpoint that supports token parameters.
trans-unit.target: 表示支持令牌参数的终点的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌除了提供包含在绑定的主令牌中的声明之外，还提供其他声明。

trans-unit.source: The collection returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.EndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A> contains additional token parameters (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>) for all operations defined by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.EndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A> 返回的集合包含针对由终结点定义的全部操作的其他令牌参数 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>)。

trans-unit.source: The primary token parameters are found on either the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> (both inherit from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class).
trans-unit.target: 主令牌参数可以在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement>（两者都继承了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 类）中找到。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>, the primary token parameters are returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.ProtectionTokenParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>，则主令牌参数由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.ProtectionTokenParameters%2A> 属性返回。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> element there are two parameter properties, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 元素上有两个参数属性，分别是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The properties are called parameters because they specify only the type of the security token, not the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性仅指定安全令牌的类型，而不指定实际值，因此被称为参数。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens can be scoped at the endpoint level, in which case they are included in all secured messages sent by the client to the service.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌的范围可确定为终结点级别，在这种情况下，从客户端发送到服务的所有安全消息都包含支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: The service enforces that all secured messages from the client contain the supporting token types configured by this property.
trans-unit.target: 此服务强制所有来自客户端安全消息包含此属性配置的支持令牌类型。

trans-unit.source: To provide supporting tokens only for an operation (not all operations on an endpoint), use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalOperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅为某个操作（而非终结点上的全部操作）提供支持令牌，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalOperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The property to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specified object using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> 获取指定对象。

trans-unit.source: The specified object from the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> or <see langword="null" /> if the object is not found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> 中的指定对象；如果找不到该对象，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method gets the specified object from the base class, or from one of that class's ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从基类或该类的一个上级中获取指定对象。

trans-unit.source: The object returned is usually a collection of properties, for example, an object that implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISecurityCapabilities>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的对象通常是一个属性集合，例如实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISecurityCapabilities> 的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the `SecurityBindingElement` does not recognize the type of property requested, it delegates the call to the binding element stack below it, passing the binding context parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `SecurityBindingElement` 无法识别请求的属性类型，则会将调用委托给其下的绑定元素堆栈，并将传递绑定上下文参数。

trans-unit.source: The types of properties that the `SecurityBindingElement` can provide are <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISecurityCapabilities> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier>.
trans-unit.target: `SecurityBindingElement` 可提供的属性类型为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISecurityCapabilities> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether time stamps are included in each message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否每条消息都包含时间戳。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if time stamps are included in each message; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果每条消息都包含时间戳，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A> property is `true` and if `DetectReplays` is `true`, WCF detects a replay attack.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A>属性是`true`如果`DetectReplays`是`true`，WCF 检测到重放攻击。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of entropy used to create keys.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建密钥的熵来源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode" /> used to create keys.
trans-unit.target: 用来创建键的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode.CombinedEntropy" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode.CombinedEntropy" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.KeyEntropyMode%2A> specifies how the key for tokens (such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken>) issued by the service is computed: whether it is computed based on the client key material only, on the service key material only, or on a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.KeyEntropyMode%2A> 指定如何计算由服务颁发的令牌密钥（如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken>）：是仅基于客户端密钥材料进行计算，还是仅基于服务密钥材料进行计算，或是同时基于两者进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding properties specific to local security settings used by the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取由客户端使用的特定于本地安全设置的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings" /> that represents the binding properties specific to local security settings used by the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端所使用的本地安全设置的绑定属性的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings" />。

trans-unit.source: The settings are local in the sense that they are not the settings derived from the security policy of the service.
trans-unit.target: 这些设置是本地的意义上说，它们不是派生自该服务的安全策略的设置。

trans-unit.source: You can get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> object and use it to set security properties for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 您可以获取 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings> 对象并使用此对象设置此绑定的安全属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to access this property to set a property in another object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何访问此属性以设置其他对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding properties specific to local security settings used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取由客户端使用的特定于本地安全设置的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings" /> object that represents the binding properties specific to local security settings used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 表示服务所使用的本地安全设置的绑定属性的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The settings are local because they are not published as part of the security policy of the service and do not affect the client's binding.
trans-unit.target: 这些设置并非作为安全策略的组成部分而发布，而且不影响客户端绑定，因此是本地的。

trans-unit.source: The following properties of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> object can help mitigate a denial-of-service (DOS) security attack:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 对象的下列属性有助于缓解拒绝服务 (DOS) 安全攻击：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.MaxCachedCookies%2A>: controls the maximum number of time-bounded `SecurityContextToken`s that are cached by the server after doing SPNEGO or SSL negotiation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.MaxCachedCookies%2A>：控制在执行 SPNEGO 或 SSL 协商之后服务器所缓存的有时限的 `SecurityContextToken` 的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.IssuedCookieLifetime%2A>: controls the lifetime of the `SecurityContextToken`s that are issued by the server following SPNEGO or SSL negotiation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.IssuedCookieLifetime%2A>：控制在进行 SPNEGO 或 SSL 协商之后服务器所发布的 `SecurityContextToken` 的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: The server caches the `SecurityContextToken`s for this period of time.
trans-unit.target: 在此时间期限内，服务器将缓存 `SecurityContextToken`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.MaxPendingSessions%2A>: controls the maximum number of secure conversations that are established at the server but for which no application messages have been processed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.MaxPendingSessions%2A>：控制在服务器上建立但尚未针为其处理任何应用程序消息的安全对话的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: This quota prevents clients from establishing secure conversations at the service, thereby causing the service to maintain state for each client, but never using them.
trans-unit.target: 此配额可防止客户端在服务上建立安全对话而导致服务维护每个客户端的状态，但是从不使用这些状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.InactivityTimeout%2A>: controls the maximum time that the service keeps a secure conversation alive without ever receiving an application message on it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.InactivityTimeout%2A>：控制服务使安全对话保持活动状态（但不接收服务上的应用程序消息）的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: This quota prevents clients from establishing secure conversations at the service, thereby causing the service to maintain state for each client, but never using them.
trans-unit.target: 此配额可防止客户端在服务上建立安全对话而导致服务维护每个客户端的状态，但是从不使用这些状态。

trans-unit.source: In a secure conversation session, note that both <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.InactivityTimeout%2A> and the `ReceiveTimeout` property on the binding affect session timeout.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在安全对话会话中，绑定上的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.InactivityTimeout%2A> 和 `ReceiveTimeout` 属性将影响会话超时。

trans-unit.source: The shorter of the two determines when timeouts occur.
trans-unit.target: 两个属性中时间较短者将确定何时发生超时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message security version.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息安全版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> object that represents the message security version.
trans-unit.target: 表示消息安全版本的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> contains numerous properties that specify version numbers of different security specifications used when securing messages exchanged on the channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>，包含大量指定不同安全规范版本号的属性，这些安全规范用于在通道中保护交换消息。

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> object is created, this property is immutable.
trans-unit.target: 在创建了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 对象后，此属性为不可变。

trans-unit.source: Calling `set` on it does not change it.
trans-unit.target: 对它调用 `set` 不会将其改变。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="set" /> with a null value.
trans-unit.target: 带有 Null 值的 <see langword="set" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of operation supporting token parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取操作支持令牌参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> of types <see cref="T:System.String" /> (key) and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> (value).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />，类型为 <see cref="T:System.String" />（键）和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />（值）。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌除了提供包含在绑定的主令牌中的声明之外，还提供其他声明。

trans-unit.source: The collection returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> property contains additional token parameters (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>) for specific operations defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> 属性返回的集合包含针对已定义的特定操作的其他令牌参数 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>)。

trans-unit.source: The primary token parameters are found on either the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> (both inherit from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class).
trans-unit.target: 主令牌参数可以在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement>（两者都继承了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 类）中找到。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>, the primary token parameters are returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.ProtectionTokenParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>，则主令牌参数由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement.ProtectionTokenParameters%2A> 属性返回。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> there are two parameter properties, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 上有两个参数属性，分别是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The properties are called parameters because they specify only the type of the security token, not the actual values.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性仅指定安全令牌的类型，而不指定实际值，因此被称为参数。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens can be scoped at a different scope than the binding, in this case the operation, in which case they are included in all secured messages sent by the client to services that have the specified Action.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌的范围可以为不同于绑定的范围（此处指操作），在这种情况下，从客户端发送到具有指定操作的服务的所有安全消息中都包含支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: To provide supporting tokens only for an operation (not all operations on an endpoint), use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalOperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅为某个操作（而非终结点上的全部操作）提供支持令牌，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalOperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the optional supporting token parameters for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务终结点的可选支持令牌参数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌除了提供包含在绑定的主令牌中的声明之外，还提供其他声明。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens can be scoped at a different scope than the binding, in this case the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌的范围可以是不同于绑定的范围（此处指终结点）。

trans-unit.source: The service does not reject the message in case it does not contain tokens that correspond to token types specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalEndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 即便消息不包含与 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalEndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A> 集合中指定的令牌类型相符的令牌，服务也不会拒绝该消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of optional operation supporting token parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取可选操作支持令牌参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> of types <see cref="T:System.String" /> (key) and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> (value).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />，类型为 <see cref="T:System.String" />（键）和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />（值）。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌除了提供包含在绑定的主令牌中的声明之外，还提供其他声明。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens can be scoped at a different scope than the binding, in this case the operation.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌的范围可以是不同于绑定的范围（此处指操作）。

trans-unit.source: The service does not reject the message in case it does not contain tokens that correspond to token types specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalOperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 即便消息不包含与 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalOperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> 集合中指定的令牌类型相符的令牌，服务也不会拒绝该消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the security binding element protects tokens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置安全绑定元素是否保护令牌。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the security binding element protects tokens; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果安全绑定元素保护标记，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordering of the elements in the security header for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此绑定的安全头中的元素排序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout" /> that represents the ordering of the elements in the security header for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 表示此绑定的安全头中的元素排序的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.Strict" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.Strict" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout> enumeration contains the following members:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout> 枚举包含下列成员：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.Strict>: Items are added to the security header according to the general principle of "declare before use".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.Strict>： 项添加到安全头按照"先使用声明"的一般原则。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.Lax>: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP Message security.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.Lax>：项以任何符合 WSS: SOAP 消息安全的顺序添加到安全头中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.LaxTimestampFirst>: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP message security except that the first element in the security header must be a `wsse:Timestamp` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.LaxTimestampFirst>：项以任何符合 WSS: SOAP 消息安全的顺序添加到安全头中，但安全头中的第一个元素必须是 `wsse:Timestamp` 元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.LaxTimestampLast>: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP message security except that the last element in the security header must be a `wsse:Timestamp` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout.LaxTimestampLast>：项以任何符合 WSS: SOAP 消息安全的顺序添加到安全头中，但安全头中的最后一个元素必须是 `wsse:Timestamp` 元素。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 该值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> object that represents the key for the token requirement property whose value is the BindingContext used to talk to the issuing party.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于令牌要求属性（其值是用来与颁布方对话的 BindingContext ）的密钥的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the BindingContext used to talk to the issuing party if the requirement is for an issued token.
trans-unit.target: 设置令牌要求属性的密钥，其值为用于和颁发方进行对话的 BindingContext（如果要求适用于已颁发的令牌）。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for system use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供系统使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to require derived keys; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 需要派生密钥；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value that indicates whether derived keys are required.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个值，该值指示是否需要派生密钥。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a description of this class.
trans-unit.target: 返回对此类的描述。

trans-unit.source: A description of the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 对当前 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> 实例的描述。

trans-unit.source: Information returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.ToString%2A> includes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.DefaultAlgorithmSuite%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.EndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.KeyEntropyMode%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalEndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.SecurityHeaderLayout%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> values of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.ToString%2A> 返回的信息包含当前实例的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.DefaultAlgorithmSuite%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.EndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.IncludeTimestamp%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.KeyEntropyMode%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OptionalEndpointSupportingTokenParameters%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.SecurityHeaderLayout%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.OperationSupportingTokenParameters%2A> 值。
